name: Otay Mesa Data Center
tag_list: web-hosting, internet-hosting, colocation, voip, dedicated-servers, san-diego-data-center, data-center, shared-servers, red-hat-enterprise-servers, centos-dedicated-servers, dedicated-hosting
overview:
Otay Mesa Data Center, Inc. is a San Diego-based provider of secure and reliable Internet, Web hosting and colocation services for companies of all sizes across the globe.

OMDC specializes in Windows, Linux and BSD dedicated servers and collocation. The company offers customized solutions, from a single, entry-level server to a complex environment of hundreds of servers configured with custom routing and firewalls. Whatever a businessâ€™ need, OMDC has the technology to power it.

With a mission to be the rockstar of the IT world, entrepreneurial IT veteran Chris Jester founded Otay Mesa Data Center, Inc. in 2004. This employee-centered business is dedicated to customer satisfaction and offers customized solutions to fit specific IT needs. For more information about Otay Mesa Data Center Inc. and their services, visit www.OMDC.net.
